department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)/Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
short_summary: Purchase of custom-built hog trailer for the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) including delivery and training on its operation in Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada
description: Purchase of custom-built hog trailer for the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) including delivery and departure of the trailer to the site and training for the users.
full_summary:
================================
### Custom-Built Hog Trailer RFP

**Reference Number**: WS3878300379 - Doc3878300434
**Solicitation Number**: WS3878300379
**Publication Date**: June 12, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: August 9, 2023 (2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time)

**Contracting Entity**
--------------------

* **Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)**
* **Contracting Entity Address**: K.W. Neatby Building, 960 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, Ontario, K1Y 4X2, Canada

**Project Details**
-------------------

We invite proposals from qualified suppliers to provide a custom-built hog trailer, complete with delivery and training on its operation in Sherbrooke, Québec, Canada. The selected supplier will be required to meet the terms and conditions outlined in the Annex “Statement of Requirements.”

**Key Requirements**

* Supply a custom-built hog trailer that meets the specified requirements
* Deliver the trailer to Sherbrooke, Québec, Canada
* Provide training on the operation and maintenance of the trailer

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**
----------------------

* **Point of Contact**: François S. Martineau
* **Email**: [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Important Dates

* **Publication Date**: June 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 9, 2023 (2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time)

### Document Availability

The document and annexes can be downloaded from the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16541003?extsite=MTY1NDEwMDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16541003?extsite=MTY1NDEwMDNfQU4wMTQ
